name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Dr. Stephen Strange casts a forbidden spell that opens a portal to the multiverse. Strange, with the help of his new ally America Chavez, must travel across the multiverse to stop a powerful new threat.

name: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and his ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic killer who seeks the extinction of the gods.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker's secret identity is exposed, and he seeks the help of Doctor Strange to erase everyone's memory of him being Spider-Man. This spell has unintended consequences, leading to the multiverse merging and bringing villains from other dimensions into their world.

name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi, a skilled martial artist, confronts his past and is drawn into the covert Ten Rings organization. He must face his father, the leader of the Ten Rings, and prevent them from unleashing a dangerous power.

name: Eternals
description: The Eternals, a group of immortal beings, reunite to protect Earth from their evil counterparts, the Deviants. They must grapple with their existence and the fate of the planet.

name: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff, also known as Black Widow, confronts her past and the dark conspiracy of the Red Room. She reunites with her family and battles a new adversary known as the Taskmaster.

name: Loki
description: Loki, the God of Mischief, is apprehended by the Time Variance Authority and must help fix the timeline he disrupted. He encounters a new threat and explores the multiverse.

name: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
description: Sam Wilson, the Falcon, and Bucky Barnes, the Winter Soldier, team up to face a new global threat. They also deal with the legacy of Captain America's shield.

name: WandaVision
description: Wanda Maximoff and Vision live a suburban life that is not what it seems. As they cycle through different sitcom eras, they begin to unravel the mysteries of their reality.

name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
description: Peter Parker goes on a school trip to Europe but is recruited by Nick Fury to face a new threat in the form of elemental creatures. He teams up with Mysterio to save the world.

name: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers strive to reverse the catastrophic events of the Infinity War. They embark on a time-travel journey to retrieve the Infinity Stones and stop the villainous Thanos.

name: Captain Marvel
description: Carol Danvers, also known as Captain Marvel, discovers her superhuman powers and becomes embroiled in the Kree-Skrull war. She seeks to uncover her past and protect the Earth.

name: Ant-Man and The Wasp
description: Scott Lang, also known as Ant-Man, teams up with Hope van Dyne, the Wasp, to rescue Janet van Dyne from the Quantum Realm. They face new challenges and adversaries.

name: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, the Black Panther and king of Wakanda, must defend his nation and the world from the villainous Erik Killmonger, who challenges T'Challa's claim to the throne.

name: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Thor, the god of thunder, is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar and forced to compete in gladiatorial games. He must escape and prevent the destructive power of Hela, the goddess of death.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
description: Star-Lord and the Guardians of the Galaxy embark on a new adventure and uncover the mystery of Peter Quill's parentage. They face powerful cosmic forces and a vengeful foe.

name: Doctor Strange
description: Dr. Stephen Strange, a brilliant but arrogant surgeon, seeks the help of the Ancient One after a car accident leaves him with damaged hands. He discovers the mystic arts and faces supernatural threats.

name: Captain America: Civil War
description: The Avengers are divided over government oversight, leading to a conflict between Captain America and Iron Man. They also face a new adversary, the Winter Soldier.

name: Ant-Man
description: Scott Lang becomes the new Ant-Man and must use his shrinking suit to prevent the misuse of the technology by the villainous Darren Cross, also known as Yellowjacket.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of unlikely heroes, the Guardians of the Galaxy, must protect the galaxy from the powerful artifact known as the Orb and the villain Ronan the Accuser.
